results.name: Triangle, A000110 in every column >0, shifted down twice.
comment: Let the triangle = M. Then Lim_{n->inf.} M^n = A173110: (1, 1, 3, 6, 20, 60,...).
formula: Bell sequence in every column, for columns >0, shifted down twice.
